synopsis.text: Detective Conan's latest film masterfully weaves together the captivating 'Jet-Black Mystery Train' story arc, offering viewers a fresh perspective on the beloved series. The movie spotlights Ai Haibara, delving into her enigmatic past and chronicling her first encounter with the brilliant young detective, Conan. In addition to revisiting pivotal moments from Haibara's journey throughout the television series, fans will be treated to thrilling new content that seamlessly bridges this film with the subsequent 'Black Iron Submarine' adventure. Prepare for an enthralling cinematic experience that combines nostalgia with intriguing new developments in the world of Detective Conan.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
